description:
The only personal trainer you’ll ever need fits right in your pocket. Whether you’re running, cycling, walking, kayaking, or something completely different, we keep you motivated, and most importantly - keep what you’re doing fun. 

Track routes, record stats and share your workouts - all from one simple app. Join more than 25 million users and start freeing your endorphins.

WHAT YOU GET FREE OF CHARGE:

TRACK YOUR FITNESS 
● Track almost any distance-based sport, including duration, speed, distance, calories and more
● Get audio feedback for every mile/km
● Enter indoor workouts manually
● Track your heart rate (works with BTLE heart rate monitors)
● Control the app through your Pebble smartwatch

ANALYZE PERFORMANCE
● Keep a full training diary
● View daily training volume
● Analyze performance like split times for each workout 

CHALLENGE YOURSELF
● Set a workout goal and let our audio coach help you reach it
● Join a challenge for a chance to win prizes

BE SOCIAL
● Receive (and send) real-time audio pep talks from friends
● Check out the news feed to comment on friends’ progress 
● Race against a friend’s personal best performance
● Share results and workouts on Facebook

PLUS
● Workout photos, tagging of friends, automatic pause when stationary, customizable home screen, countdown, and much more

All your data is automatically sent directly to your profile on www.endomondo.com. Here, you can analyze your data, delve into your stats, track your progress, and interact and compete with people all around the world. 

Get up, get moving and free your endorphins! 


NOTE: Don’t forget that having your GPS running can really drain your battery, so remember to turn it off after your workout. 


GET ENDOMONDO PREMIUM
Gain access to exclusive features with Endomondo Premium from just USD 2.50 a month.

● Reach your running goal with a personal training plan
● View statistics like calories burned per month, running distance by year, etc.
● Analyze heart rate zones for every workout (requires a compatible heart rate monitor)
● View weather info in workout summary
● Enjoy an ad-free experience
● Get access to 10+ more motivating features

Should you choose to upgrade to Endomondo Premium, payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. The monthly subscription costs USD 3.99 per month while the yearly subscription costs USD 29.99 per year or USD 2.50 per month. 

Your subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off in your Account Settings in iTunes after purchase.

Find the full terms and conditions and our privacy policy at http://www.endomondo.com/terms and http://www.endomondo.com/privacy, respectively.
trackCensoredName: Endomondo – Running, Cycling, Walking, Fitness Workout Tracker & Personal Coach Using GPS
